name: Da Yeung
story: Xianliang Tang is a dedicated soldier who joined the OPFOR faction in his early twenties. He has served in numerous battles and has honed his skills as a Rifleman. Xianliang is married and has two children, a son and a daughter. He is a devout Buddhist and practices meditation in his free time. He is known to be reserved and introspective, preferring to observe and assess before taking action.
